introduction:
Hi there! My name is Liam.
I'm a Web Developer currently living in Bromley.
Welcome to my site, here you can see a brief overview of who I am and what I've done. This is a work in progress so please bear with me and if you notice any issues, please let me know.
You can request an updated copy of my CV here or get in touch with me via social media or e-mail. I'm always happy to chat!
